info.name: Feats
info.description: Feats from Grim Hollow - Lairs of Etharis

description.p: You've trained in crafting items using a skill or tool that you're proficient with, and the steps in crafting have become second nature to you. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: The time it takes to create an item using your proficient skills or tools is halved.
If you fail to successfully craft the item and would lose the components, you retain the components instead.

sheet.description: The time it takes to create an item using your proficient skills or tools is halved. If you fail to successfully craft the item and would lose the components, you retain the components instead.

description.p: You've trained in crafting items using a skill or tool that you're proficient with, and your creations are known for being well made and reliable. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You make all ability checks for crafting with advantage.
Anyone assisting you in crafting an item gains advantage on their ability checks for crafting.
If you fail to successfully craft the item, the amount of time it took to complete the process is halved.

sheet.description: You make all ability checks for crafting with advantage. Anyone assisting you in crafting an item gains advantage on their ability checks for crafting. If you fail to successfully craft the item, the amount of time it took to complete the process is halved.
